label: Vaillant generic file for all BAI types
description: Vaillant generic file for all BAI types

template.name: PartloadHcKW
template.label: Heating part load

template.name: WPPostrunTime
template.label: water pump overrun time for heating mode

template.name: BlockTimeHcMax
template.label: max. burner anti cycling period at 20째C Flow temperature setpoint

slave.label: hot water flow temperature (combination boiler only)
current temperature for warm start sensor (combinations boiler only) Current storage tank sensor (system boiler only)

slave.name: FlowTempDesired
slave.label: Flow temperature target value or return target value when return regulation is set

slave.name: StorageTempDesired
slave.label: Warm start temperature value (combination boiler plus only), Storage temperature target value (system boiler only)

slave.name: ExtFlowTempDesiredMin
slave.label: minimum out of Kl.7 and eBus flow setpoint

slave.name: CirPump
slave.label: Hot water circulation pump (via external module)

slave.name: HwcDemand
slave.label: domestic hot water (tapping or tank contact) demand

slave.name: StoragereleaseClock
slave.label: hot water release (tank storage) via eBus Control

slave.name: PositionValveSet
slave.label: Position of diverter valve; 100 = DHW, 0 = heating, 40 = middle position

slave.name: IonisationVoltageLevel
slave.label: digital ionisation voltage> 80 no flame< 40 good flame

slave.name: externalFlowTempDesired
slave.label: Flow target temperature from external regulator to terminal 7-8-9

slave.name: GasvalveUC
slave.label: Activation signal of the gasvalve (activated via micrcontroller)

slave.name: VolatileLockout
slave.label: TRUE: STB failures is volatileFALSE: STB failure is not volataile

slave.name: FlameSensingASIC
slave.label: ioni/adc value from the flame control circuit

slave.name: EbusSourceOn
slave.label: Activation signal of the eBus source

slave.name: Templimiter
slave.label: feedback signal of the temperature limiter

slave.name: EbusVoltage
slave.label: feedback signal of the eBus source

slave.name: FluegasvalveOpen
slave.label: feedback of the flue gas valve
Power Values of the Boiler (min Power, max Power)

slave.name: WPSecondStage
slave.label: Second stage of the pump activated

slave.name: TemplimiterWithNTC
slave.label: Safety temperature limit concept:1 = safety temp. Limit check with NTC0 = safety temp. Limit check with contact

slave.name: VortexFlowSensor
slave.label: Predictive Maintenance data, CH water flow

slave.name: InitialisationEEPROM
slave.label: Initialisation off all EEPROM values (done in the production)

slave.name: FanMinSpeedOperation
slave.label: Minimum Fan speed of the appliance

slave.name: FanMaxSpeedOperation
slave.label: Maximum Fan speed of the appliance
DCF Time / date stamp struct { uchar sec; uchar min; uchar std; uchar tag; uchar mon; uchar wtg; uchar jah; } Tdcf77_time;

template.name: ReturnRegulation
template.label: heating flow/return regulation activation

template.name: HcPumpMode
template.label: Pump mode

template.name: SecondPumpMode
template.label: Operating mode of the two-stage heating pump0: burner mode = 2, pre/post-run = 1; 1: CH + post-run = 1, DHW = 2, 2: as 1 but rotation speed in CH is dependent of heating part load, (defaultsetting)3: always stage 2

template.name: HwcTempMax
template.label: Adjustment of maximum tank setpoint range (maximum endposition of potmeter)

template.name: AccessoriesOne
template.label: Accesory relay 1 function

template.name: AccessoriesTwo
template.label: Accesory relay 2 function

template.name: FanSpeedOffsetMin
template.label: Offset for minimum fan speed

template.name: FanSpeedOffsetMax
template.label: Offset for maximum fan speed

template.name: SolPostHeat
template.label: special DHW functions0: solar function deactivated (default)1: solar function activated and DHW setpoint minimum 60째C2: solar function activated and DHW setpoint like combi standard (min 35째)3: DHW setpoint minimum 60째C (poti)

slave.name: DeactivationsTemplimiter
slave.label: Number of safety temperature limiter cut offs

commands.label: d.61 Number ignition device cut off

slave.name: DeactivationsIFC
slave.label: number of lock outs (unsuccessfull ignitons in the last attempt, flame failure)

slave.name: CounterStartattempts1
slave.label: unsuccessfull ignitions in the first attempt

slave.name: CounterStartattempts2
slave.label: unsuccessfull ignitions in the second attempt

template.name: ValveMode
template.label: Set diverter valve position 0=normal mode, 1=middle position (GB), 2=permanent CH position

template.name: FlowsetHcMax
template.label: Adjustment of maximum central heating setpoint range (maximum endposition of potmeter)

template.name: HwcPostrunTime
template.label: Pump overrun time after charging a storage (charging through C1-C2, external/internal tank with tank sensor)

template.name: WarmstartOffset
template.label: Offset for warm start target value (combination boilers only)

template.name: StorageLoadTimeMax
template.label: Maximum charging time for a storage without own control

template.name: PartloadHwcKW
template.label: storage part load (storage charging capacity limit)

commands.label: d.78 Max value flow temp storage

template.name: FlowsetHwcMax
template.label: storage charging temperature limit (target flow temperature in storage mode)

template.name: HoursTillService
template.label: Maintenance indicator:Number of hours until the next maintenance

template.name: DSNOffset
template.label: DSN aplliance variant setting

template.name: SetFactoryValues
template.label: Factory settings

slave.name: TempGradientFailure
slave.label: Number of cut offs of the boilers cause of to high gradient (S.54)

slave.name: TempDiffBlock
slave.label: Number of modulationblocking of the boilers cause of to high/incorrect difference of flow/return temperatures

slave.name: TempDiffFailure
slave.label: Number of cut offs of the boilers cause of to high/incorrect differences of flow/return temperatures

slave.name: ValveStarts
slave.label: commutations of the three way valve

slave.name: OverflowCounter
slave.label: Predictive Maintenance counter have got an overflow

slave.name: maintenancedata_HwcTempMax
slave.label: maximum temperature measured by the domestic hot water outlet sensor

slave.name: StorageTempMax
slave.label: maximum temperature measured by the external tank sensor

slave.name: FlowTempMax
slave.label: maximum temperature measured by the flow sensor

slave.name: FanPWMSum
slave.label: Predictive Maintenance data for the fan damage recognition

slave.name: FanPWMTest
slave.label: Predictive Maintenance data for the fan damage recognition

slave.name: HwcWaterflowMax
slave.label: domestic hot water flow sensor maximum value

slave.name: CounterStartAttempts3
slave.label: unsuccessfull ignitions in the third attempt

slave.name: CounterStartAttempts4
slave.label: unsuccessfull ignitions in the fourth attempt

slave.name: PumpHwcFlowNumber
slave.label: number of times DHW flow rate was detected

slave.name: SHEMaxDeltaHwcFlow
slave.label: maximum difference between flow and DHW outlet temperature
